term.title: sol-gel transition

item.text: Transition of a sol to a gel at the gel point.

notes.item: Corrected from previous definition, within which the definition improperly attempts a redefinition of the terms sol and gel. The definition proposed here is recommended for its precision through cross-reference to the properly defined terms.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1826 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
